inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient agrees to participate, signs research protocol and HIPAA consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: prenatal care and labor and delivery managed by physician per standard of care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: randomized to Arm 1 (Staples) or Arm 2 (Prolene) or Arm 3 (Monocryl or Vicryl)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: cesarean section performed per physician discretion
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain level assessed on first and third or fourth day after surgery and again at six weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: pregnant women undergoing primary or repeat cesarean section
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: maternal age greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: gestational age greater than or equal to 34 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient's chart flagged indicating she is a study participant
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: routine surgical preparation and procedures followed per standard of care
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Maternal age less than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has MDD, but is on anti-depressants and has no history of drug or alcohol abuse. She does not have any contraindications to NSAIDs.
